title: darryl25
author: darryl25
content: I can provide Paxful Level 3 accounts, noones also available. All accounts are ID Verified and Address Verified.I can provide in bulk, depending on your needs.In a very cheap price$30 each account, $20/each if bulk (4-5 accounts).I can do account first, you can login and check before payment.Provided:Email and PasswordPaxful Email and Password.All accounts are fresh.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.created_time: September 14, 2023, 09:57:27 PMLast edit: September 15, 2023, 08:16:30 AM by JeromeTash
comments.body: ATTENTIONThis is most likely a scam. Anyone thinking of buying Verified paxful accounts may end up losing the money the used to purchase the account plus the funds in the account1. Accounts are mostly likely hacked or stolen and at one point in time the owner may try to recover their account, and you get locked out since he can provide valid KYC and you won't be able to2. Paxful may freeze your funds and ask for further verification, in future of which you will present documents that don't match the original information. Your account can then be blocked with the funds.
